name: web-journey-recorder-pro
description: Chrome Extension for recording technical user journeys with network and UI auditing.

scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true });" && esbuild index.tsx background/service-worker.js scripts/content-script.js options.js --bundle --outdir=dist --format=esm --loader:.tsx=tsx --loader:.js=js --minify && npm run build:css && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['manifest.json', 'index.html', 'options.html'].forEach(f => fs.copyFileSync(f, 'dist/' + f)); if (fs.existsSync('icons')) fs.cpSync('icons', 'dist/icons', { recursive: true });"
